text: @icahdq #ica21 Important for all reviewers! Save your comments in your doc and copy and paste to the system, don't write to the system directly. You may lose it. I reviewed two papers and typed my feedback directly to the Reviewer Comments boxes. And? One big comment is gone!

RT @hnmiecz: #ica21 reviewer tips
this one is especially important because many of our colleagues, since it is an INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE,‚Ä¶

Yup. Seriously stuff it with your "I see poor syntax etc. etc. etc." I can only imagine how I'd sound if I were to write in German or Traditional Chinese. We don't need APA comments either. 

Be stern-but-kind, and comment to celebrate and/or improve the scholarship.
